Description: Body sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery phiale mesomphalos; white slip; interior glazed streaky black; two faded added white bands above lotus bud frieze in white outline with added red centres; exterior: lion (chest and forelegs remaining) to right; below, band of dots between narrow lines.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 298, no. 989)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1968) (phase 2)
